targets.expr:
(
  (DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{job="dcgm_exporter"} > bool 100)
  or
  (DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_UTIL{job="dcgm_exporter"} > bool 0)
)
or on(gpu,instance)
(
  (sum by (gpu, instance) (
     count_over_time(DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{job="dcgm_exporter"}[7d])
   ) > 0)
  * 0
  + -1
)

description: This dashboard is to display the metrics from DCGM Exporter and summary of all the GPUs
title: GPU Summary
